description: This is a test suite for the LanceDb vector database implementation, including fixtures and test cases for creating, inserting, searching, upserting, and handling documents within the LanceDb class, using pytest framework.

methods.name: lance_db
methods.description: Fixture to create and clean up a LanceDb instance

methods.description: Test creating a table in LanceDb

methods.description: Test vector search functionality in LanceDb

methods.name: test_keyword_search
methods.description: Test keyword search functionality in LanceDb

methods.name: test_hybrid_search
methods.description: Test hybrid search functionality in LanceDb

methods.name: test_bad_vectors_handling
methods.description: Test handling of bad vectors in LanceDb
